strong.head: MAT 16:1
strong.trans: a member of a politically influential Jewish party in Jerusalem at the time of Jesus and the apostles, a smaller group than the Pharisees, but often in control of important political and religious positions. Their denial of the resurrection of the dead and their acceptance of only the first five books of the OT are important elements in some of the differences which arose between the Sadducees and the Pharisees

Miembro de uno de los partidos religiosos judíos más conservadores y elitistas. Los saduceos rechazaban la resurrección, la existencia de ángeles y demonios y aceptaban como validos únicamente los libros del Pentateuco. Sus seguidores eran gente de buena posición económica, más que de las masas populares.
Sadducéen [membre d'un parti religieux juif]

anggota partai Yahudi yang berpengaruh secara politik di Yerusalem pada zaman Yesus dan para rasul-rasul. Orang Saduki adalah kelompok yang lebih kecil daripada orang Farisi, tetapi sering mengendalikan posisi politik dan agama yang penting. Mereka menolak kebangkitan orang mati dan menerima hanya otoritas kelima kitab Musa.

Membro de um dos partidos religiosos judeus mais conservadores e elitistas. Os saduceus não acreditavam em ressurreição, na existência de anjos e demônios; por outro lado, aceitavam como válidos unicamente os livros do Pentateuco. Seus seguidores eram pessoas de nível econômico elevado, sendo difícil encontrar um saduceu nas camadas populares.

strong.head: JHN 11:46
strong.trans: a member of an important religious and political Jewish party at the time of Jesus and the apostles. The Pharisees constituted a significantly larger group than the Sadducees and differed with them on certain doctrines and patterns of behavior. The Pharisees were strict and jealous adherents to the laws of the OT and to numerous additional traditions

Miembro de uno de los partidos religiosos judíos. A diferencia de los saduceos los fariseos tenían en cuenta el interés público, creían en la resurrección, la inmortalidad del alma y en la anulación del destino. Una de sus principales preocupaciones fue el cumplimiento estricto e individual de la ley.
Pharisien [membre d'une secte religieuse juive]

seorang anggota partai Yahudi politik dan agama yang penting pada zaman Yesus dan para rasul-rasul. Orang-orang Farisi merupakan kelompok yang lebih besar daripada orang Saduki dan berbeda dengan mereka pada doktrin dan pola perilaku tertentu. orang-orang Farisi adalah pengikut yang ketat dan rajin pada hukum Perjanjian Lama dan banyak tradisi tambahan

Membro de um dos partidos religiosos dos judeus. Ao contrário dos saduceus, os fariseus levavam em conta o interesse público e acreditavam na ressurreição. Uma de suas principais preocupações era o rigoroso cumprimento individual da lei de Moisés.

strong.head: NAM 3:17
strong.trans: six-legged winged insect characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment

serangga bersayap enam kaki, kaki ketiganya memanjang dan beradaptasi dengan melompat;bergerak dalam gerombolan yang bermigrasi ke daerah baru; di lain waktu hidup menyendiri atau dalam kelompok kecil; dimakan dimasak dengan memanggang atau menggoreng, meskipun di beberapa tempat mereka juga dimakan mentah; hewan halal, dapat dimakan; karena jumlah mereka yang besar dan karakteristik yang berkerumun, belalang adalah lambang dari pasukan penyerang besar yang tidak ada pertahanan dan juga lambang hukuman ilahi.

strong.head: ISA 59:11
strong.trans: large mammal with thick fur and doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; may be 2 m. tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; Ursus arctos syriacus; dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; associated with violence and danger

Mamífero grande (Ursus arctos syriacus) con pelaje grueso; camina a cuatro patas, pero puede pararse con las patas traseras; se alimenta de raíces, bayas, frutas silvestres, ratones y lagartijas y pequeños animales.
ours [FF 8.9]

binatang menyusui besar dengan bulu tebal dan wajah seperti anjing; berjalan dengan empat kaki tetapi bisa berdiri dengan kaki belakang untuk mendapatkan tampilan yang lebih baik; beratnya lebih dari 200 kilogram; memakan akar, buah beri, buah liar, tikus, dan kadal, dan kadang-kadang juga ternak kecil; berbahaya saat diprovokasi atau dirampok anak-anaknya; terkait dengan kekerasan dan bahaya
bear

strong.head: 2CH 1:3
strong.trans: sacred tent set up by Moses for meeting with the Lord, described in EXO 33.7; used for housing the ark of the covenant and for religious activity, including consulting the Lord and bringing offerings

trans.gloss: tabernáculo de reunión, tienda de reunión

strong.trans: tienda sagrada establecida por Moisés para encontrarse con el Señor, descrito en Ex. 33:7; usado para cobijar el arca del pacto y para actividades religiosas que incluían el consultar al Señor y presentar ofrendas
tenda suci yang didirikan oleh Musa untuk bertemu dengan Tuhan; digunakan untuk menampung tabut perjanjian dan untuk kegiatan keagamaan, termasuk berkonsultasi dengan Tuhan dan membawa persembahan

strong.head: ISA 7:18
strong.trans: flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and converts it into honey; lives in swarms made up of many thousands of insects; stings only when threatened; with connotations ranging from positive (food producing) to negative (as metaphor for an army of well-organized enemies)
Insecto volador que recoge el néctar de las flores y lo convierte en miel; vive en enjambres.
serangga terbang yang mengumpulkan nektar dari bunga dan mengubahnya menjadi madu; hidup dalam kawanan yang terdiri dari ribuan serangga
bee

penunjukan kolektif berbagai binatang air yang berdarah dingin, memiliki insang, biasanya sirip, dan biasanya tubuh memanjang ditutupi dengan sisik; atau, dalam arti yang longgar, berbagai hewan air lainnya; sumber makanan penting

strong.head: JER 24:1
strong.trans: wild perennial plant without stem; with large, fleshy, forked roots; with large oval leaves arranged in a rosette, purple flowers and yellow-green fruits; mandragora officinarum; used medicinally as narcotic and purgative; because its roots resemble the lower part of the human body this plant was generally believed to induce conception; its fragrance was considered sweet

Planta de zonas sombrías y húmedas cuya altura es de 30 cm. El fruto es de un color amarillento; su aspecto es similar al de una pequeña manzana. Se ha usado de manera medicinal pues al ingerirlo tiene un efecto narcótico y purgativo.

tanaman liar tanpa batang; dengan akar besar, berdaging, bercabang; dengan daun oval besar disusun dalam roset, bunga-bunga ungu dan buah-buahan kuning-hijau; digunakan secara medis sebagai narkotika dan pencahar; keharumannya dianggap manis

strong.head: NUM 24:6

strong.head: NEH 8:15
strong.trans: evergreen tree or bush, up to 1.5 m. high; dark glossy leaves are dense on the branches, and the flowers are white or pink; whole plant gives off an agreeable odour; used by the Jews in the Feast of Tabernacles (NEH 8:15).
Árbol o arbusto de hoja perenne que despide un olor agradable.

originaire de l'Asie mineure et des pays méditerranéens, où elle croît la plupart du temps dans des vallées au sol humide. C'est un arbre ou un buisson à feuilles persistantes, qui peut atteindre une taille de 1,5 m. Les feuilles brillant foncées sont denses sur les branches, et les fleurs sont blanches ou roses. Toute la plante dégage une odeur agréable. Il a été employé par les juifs pour la fête des Tabernacles [NEH.8:15].

pohon cemara atau semak-semak,daun mengkilap gelap padat di cabang-cabang, dan bunganya putih atau merah muda; seluruh tanaman mengeluarkan bau yang menyenangkan; digunakan oleh orang-orang Yahudi pada Hari Raya Pondok Daun (NEH 8:15).

trans.gloss: myrtle; native of Asia Minor and the Mediterranean countries, where it grows mostly in valleys on moist soil. It is an evergreen tree or bush, which may reach a height of 1.5 m. The dark glossy leaves are dense on the branches, and the flowers are white or pink. The whole plant gives off an agreeable odour. It was used by the Jews in the Feast of Tabernacles (neh 8:15).

strong.head: LEV 11:22
strong.trans: six-legged winged insect whose third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment; also may symbolize something small and insignificant

strong.trans: plant with a shrub-like base and stems which are stiff, many-branched, hairy, and strong, 50-80 cm tall; Origanum syriacum or Majorana syriaca; used by the Jews in the ritual purification process as a sprinkling brush.

plante avec une base comme les arbustes et des tiges qui sont droites, raide et fortes. Quand il croît de la terre il atteint une taille de juste au-dessous
tanaman dengan dasar dan batang seperti semak yang kaku, banyak bercabang dan kuat; digunakan oleh orang Yahudi dalam proses pengudusan ritual sebagai sikat percikan

hyssop (origanum maru); plant with a shrub-like base and stems which are erect, stiff and strong. When it grows from the ground it reaches a height of just under one meter. It may also spring out of crevices in walls, cliffs and rocks. Its leaves and branches are hairy, and its flowers white. The plant is aromatic, and the dried leaves are used as a condiments in Israel and Egypt, where it grows. It belongs to the mint family. The leaves and little branches, when collected in bunches, were suitable for sprinkling purposes, as the hairy surface would hold the liquid. For this reason the plant was used in the ritual purification of the Jews.

strong.head: PSA 104:17
strong.trans: large bird with long legs and a long neck; the white stork has a white body and black wings; the black stork is a glossy brownish black color with a white belly; both varieties have a red beak and legs; both types spend most of the time on the ground or in shallow water searching for food; the white stork eats mainly locusts, grasshoppers, and other insects, as well as frogs, lizards, and the chicks of ground-nesting birds; the black stork eats the same things but prefers fish and frogs; Ciconia ciconia or Ciconia nigra; unclean animal, not to be eaten
cigogne [FF 78]

burung besar dengan kaki panjang dan leher panjang; bangau putih memiliki tubuh putih dan sayap hitam; bangau hitam adalah warna hitam kecoklatan mengkilap dengan perut putih; kedua varietas memiliki paruh dan kaki merah; kedua jenis menghabiskan sebagian besar waktu di tanah atau di air dangkal mencari makanan; bangau putih memakan belalang dan serangga lainnya, serta katak, kadal, dan anak-anak burung yang bersarang di darat; bangau hitam memakan hal yang sama tetapi lebih suka ikan dan katak; binatang najis, tidak untuk dimakan

strong.head: PSA 78:46
strong.trans: six-legged winged insect whose third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment
sauterelle [FF 53.54]

serangga bersayap enam kaki; sepasang kaki ketiga memanjang dan disesuaikan untuk melompat; bergerak dalam gerombolan yang bermigrasi ke daerah baru; di lain waktu hidup menyendiri atau dalam kelompok kecil; dimakan dimasak dengan memanggang atau menggoreng, atau mentah; hewan halal, dapat dimakan; karena jumlah mereka yang besar di gerombolan, belalang adalah lambang dari pasukan penyerang yang luas melawan yang tidak ada pertahanan dan juga lambang hukuman ilahi
locust

strong.head: LEV 19:31

trans.gloss: medium; one who consults the spirits of the dead; soothsayer

strong.trans: someone able to communicate with the spirits of the dead; and so be able to give advice on how to handle a difficult situation or predict what its outcome will be; forbidden in law of Moses; always occurs in the expression אוֹב וְיִדְּעֹנִי , suggesting a hendiadys meaning: "one experienced in communication with spritis of the dead"; if not a hendiadys the sense may be: "spirits of the dead and those who contact them"

strong.head: GEN 8:8
strong.trans: Asiatic Rock dove: bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; Columba via; used as food and for sacrifices; regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility, and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
colombe [FF 23.24]

burung dengan warna biru-abu-abu dengan kemilau merah muda pada bulu leher dan ujung hitam di ekornya; hidup di koloni besar dan makan terutama biji-bijian; memiliki sarang beberapa kali setahun; sarang di tepian batu; digunakan sebagai makanan dan untuk pengorbanan; dianggap sebagai cepat, patuh, dan tidak bersalah, tetapi juga konyol dan tidak masuk akal; terkait dengan kasih sayang, kesuburan, dan seksualitas karena kebiasaan kawinnya; suara erangan burung ini kadang-kadang dikaitkan dengan rasa sakit dan penderitaan

strong.head: 1KI 4:23
strong.trans: Bubal or Red Hartebeest (Alcelaphus buselaphus): large antelope about 1.5 m high at the shoulder; males and females have long faces with a large lump on the head from which sprout short thick horns that curve upward and forward for half their length and then angle sharply backwards; reddish brown in color; plains animal, grazing in herds; or, Roe Deer (Capreolus capreolus): small deer; adult male has short horns that have three prongs; fur is brownish in summer and gray in winter; lives singly or in pairs in the undergrowth of forests and thick woodland, never moving more than one or two m from cover

strong.head: JER 51:14
strong.trans: six-legged winged insect whose third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment
sauterelle [FF 53.54]

serangga bersayap enam kaki; sepasang kaki ketiga memanjang dan disesuaikan untuk melompat; bergerak dalam gerombolan yang bermigrasi ke daerah baru; di lain waktu hidup menyendiri atau dalam kelompok kecil; dimakan dimasak dengan memanggang atau menggoreng, atau mentah; hewan halal, dapat dimakan; karena jumlah mereka yang besar di gerombolan, belalang adalah lambang dari pasukan penyerang yang luas melawan yang tidak ada pertahanan dan juga lambang hukuman ilahi

strong.head: JOB 39:1
strong.trans: fairly large wild goat; adult reaches about 90 cm at the shoulder; most of the year its color is grayish but turns browner in winter; male has thick long horns over 130 cm in length which curve backwards in a semicircle; female's horns are about 40 cm long; last few centimeters of the horns are smooth, the rest are ringed with ridges; lives in small herds in the mountains and prefers cliffs and crags, where it lives off the bushes that grow on the ledges; clean animal, may be eaten

strong.trans: tree, with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; 7.5 to 9 m. high; sheds its leaves; has small inconspicuous flowers; Pistacia terebinthus or Pistacia atlantica; the stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; the nuts are used for dyeing and tanning animal skins, and can be eaten if roasted; imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship, revered by ancient Israelites and other peoples, who built shrines and altars in the terebinth groves, and sometimes buried people there; 3- אַיִל, אַלָּה
Variedad de pistache (Pistacia terebinthus) que crece en Palestina, su tallo contiene una trementina aromática y un jugo resinoso.
[1] térebinthe, arbre [FF 154.182.183]

pohon, dengan mahkota lebar, cabang-cabang berat, dan batang tebal; tempat yang disukai untuk duduk di bawah dan menikmati keteduhan, terkait dengan pemujaan, dihormati oleh orang Israel kuno dan orang-orang lain, yang membangun tempat pemujaan dan altar di hutan belantara, dan terkadang mengubur orang di sana

terebinth; tree with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; may reach a height of 7.5 to 9 m.; sheds its leaves; has small an inconspicuous flowers; ◄ pistacia terebinthus; ► its stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; it provides pleasant shade; ≈ imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship (FF 154,182,183)

strong.head: HOS 4:13
strong.trans: Quercus macrolepsis: a large tree reaching height of 25 meters (82 feet); found either alone or in clumps or forests; loses leaves in winter. Also refers to Quercus calliprinos: large shrub branching at ground level, evergreen. Functioned as landmarks, grave markers, or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

Quercus macrolepis , árbol grande que alcanza hasta 25 metros (82 pies) de altura, sus ramas alcanzan hasta 5.5. metros (18 pies) de ancho, pierde sus hojas cada invierno; o Quercus calliprinos (roble de Palestina), arbusto grande cuyas ramas se expanden al nivel del suelo y de hoja siempre verde

strong.head: JDG 6:5
strong.trans: six-legged winged insect characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment.

strong.head: EXO 16:24
strong.trans: small, soft, legless, tube-shaped creatures that have no bones or shells. They typically feed on overripe fruit, rotting meat, and similar things; most are larvae that hatch from the eggs laid by flies or some beetles; symbols of uncleanness, decay, and death

Mereka biasanya memakan buah yang terlalu matang, daging busuk, dan hal-hal serupa; sebagian besar adalah larva yang menetas dari telur yang diletakkan oleh lalat atau kumbang; lambang kenajisan, kerusakan, dan kematian

strong.head: 1KI 7:18
strong.trans: small tree 3-5 m tall, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; Punica granatum; red flower; round fruit has a hard skin, with tightly-packed pockets of seeds inside; seeds were sometimes made into wine; one of the seven “special” foods mentioned that the Israelites would find in Canaan; flower-shaped end of the pomegranate fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple
granada

pohon kecil setinggi 3-5 m, dengan daun hijau tua yang sempit dan cabang berduri; bunga merah; buah bundar memiliki kulit keras, dengan kantong-kantong penuh biji di dalamnya; biji kadang-kadang dibuat menjadi anggur; salah satu dari tujuh makanan "istimewa" menyebutkan bahwa orang Israel akan menemukan di Kanaan; ujung buah delima berbentuk bunga menjadikannya hiasan yang menarik di atas batu dan di pelipis

strong.trans: medium-sized antelope, about the size of a donkey; slender horns over a meter long; light color with dark markings on face; strong runner; Oryx leucoryx; known for strength and bravery; clean animal, may be eaten
Antílope con aspecto de caballo, es de mediana estatura como el asno, posee largos cuernos rectos y anillados. Animal resistente a las temperaturas extremas. Famoso por su valentía y fuerza.

strong.head: HOS 2:12
strong.trans: grows 5-8 m high; round crown and very deep roots; Ficus carica; fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type, and is sweet and soft; image of peace and happiness in Israel was “every man under his vine and under his fig tree
Árbol originario de Asia occidental y cultivado en Palestina, su fruto ha sido muy apreciado por su alto contenido de azúcar.
